attributes.action: ensure that charities are politically indpendent by ensuring no national committee member has been politically active.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This petition aims to ensure that all charities remain politically independent by stopping elected officals, or ex-elected officials being on the national committee of a charity (for 10 years). This legislation is required because an ex-mp became director general of a national charity soon after losing her seat. How can this charity be politically independent?
